helpText.headline: The headline text you have to click on to open the collapsed text.
helpText.borderColor: If border color is enabled, the color can be configured here. This option is intended for a plain design without background colors.

label.buttonText: Insert the text for your button:

placeholder.buttonText: Enter the text on your button here..
placeholder.border: If you don't want a border you can leave this field empty
placeholder.width: leave this empty for automatic width
placeholder.height: leave this empty for automatic height
placeholder.borderRadius: For example: 10px. This will round the edges of your button

helpText.buttonText: This is the text that will be written on your button
helpText.buttonTextColor: You can set any color for the text on your button here
helpText.buttonUrl: Plase enter the URL you are linking right here. For external links use the full adress. For internal links you should enter /page/
helpText.buttonColor: This will be the background color of your button
helpText.border: This will give your button a border. You can choose how big this border will be in this setting. You don't have to set a border
helpText.borderColor: You can choose a border color here. Your border doesn't have to be the same color as your button.
helpText.borderRadius: Increase the border-radius to make your button round. If you don't want a round button leave me alone
helpText.textHoverColor: Text color if you hover your mouse over the button
helpText.buttonHoverColor: Button color if you hover your mouse over the button
